In instances where this is not feasible, an energy statement must be submitted with the planning application demonstrating that it is not technically feasible or economically viable. Tower Hamlets Local Plan 381 REUSE, RECYCLING AND WASTE 20.46 Part 2 seeks to offer applicants guidance on the content of management plans which are to be designed to ensure the operation of waste management facilities does not detrimentally impact on the amenity, environmental and infrastructure of the surrounding area during construction, operation and decommissioning.
